Edges-Power -- Male Saxa Human Veteran Priest
Attributes (7 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d8 Strength: d4 Vigor: d6
Attribute Notes: Necromantic Weakness: -2 vs. undead effects
Skills (21 Points):
Faith: (spi) d10 Knowledge (Arcana): (sma) d8 Stealth: (agi) d4
Fighting: (agi) d8 Riding: (agi) d4 Survival: (sma) d4
Healing: (sma) d8 Spellcasting: (sma) d8
Languages: Beastspeech; Black Tongue; Earthtongue; Saxa
Skill Notes:
Black Sheep: -2 Charisma (heahwisards)
One Eye+: -1 Charisma unless missing eye is covered
Size: 0 Deity: Sigel
Advances: 8 Improvement Points: 22 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 4; Edge: 12; Skill: 6
Description Notes: Diverse: +2 Improvement Points (edge or skills)
Features
Edges (6 points): Arcane Background (Miracles); Delay Spell; Potent Magic; Reflect Spell; Righteous Miracles; Watcher Of The Black Gate Hindrances: Black Sheep; Necromantic Weakness; One Eye+ Saxa Human Features: Diverse
Feature Notes:
One Eye+: -2 Shooting/-2 Throwing/-2 tasks requiring depth perception
Arcane Background (Miracles): Violating core beliefs inflicts -2 Faith for 1 wk; major sins remove powers
Black Sheep: Ostracized by magocratic nobility
Connections: May call in favors from acquaintance or organization
Orders: Takes orders from outside power
Combat
Parry: 7 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 6 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Hide Shield: Small Shield Weapons: Long Spear (d4+d4); Throwing Knife (d4+d4 R3"); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Long Spear Strength Penalty: Lowers damage to d4
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +3
Long Spear Parry Modifier: +1 Parry when wielded
Watcher Of The Black Gate: +2 vs. demon powers
Arcana
Power Count: 2 Power Points: 10
Powers:
Dispel: (3 PP) R8" Ends targeted power (Arcane skill neg, +2 if types differ)
Environmental Protection: (2 PP) RTouch Target gains protection from hazards for 1 hr
Light: (2 PP) R8" Creates 3" radius bright light for 30 min
Precognition: (2 PP) RSelf Allows rearranging 2 Action Cards (Raise 4) next rd
Prolonged Blast: (5 PP) R24" Choice of 1" or 2" radius inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) while maintained
Sanctuary: (3 PP) RSelf Teleports to safe location
Stun: (2 PP) R12" Target Shaken (Vigor neg)
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Miracles): 2 Powers/10 Power Points
Delay Spell: May postpone spell effect 1 - 6 rds
Potent Magic: Targets suffer -1 arcane resistance; others' dispel attempts suffer -2
Reflect Spell: Raise on Dispel allows turning spell back on caster
Righteous Miracles: Demon targets suffer +2 power damage and -2 Trait rolls
